p:
The meaning of the product σ
max ⋅ τ is an estimate proportional to the conduction G in the region of high conductivity. The conduction is related to the resistance R as G = 1/ R. From the experimental point of view, the hyperbolic dependence σ
max ( τ) can be explained by the presence of inhomogeneities in the charge structure, which are negligible only for a single crystal.
